features: Made of 100% recycled polyester ½"high-pile fleece and insulated with 700-fill-power 100% Recycled Down(duck and goose down reclaimed from down products); Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
Lined with smooth 100% recycled polyester plain weave to block wind and for easy on/off
Warm, three-panel hood construction with spandex binding at opening for a secure fit
Full-length zipper with wind flap and zipper garage eliminates chin chafe
Two zippered handwarmer pockets with webbing pulls
Spandex binding at cuffs keeps cold out
